channel.title: Please help!
channel.description: PLZ HELP GUYS! wen i download a source and a client. i press runserver and then go onto the client. wen it loads and stuff, it wont connect and keeps saying "cant connect to server". ive tried a few servers and they all say the same thing. my java is good and everything. PLZ HELP!

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @lostbro lostbro
item.description:
@lostbro wrote:

you have to change its ip lol, go into gui/egui [client side] and client.java [server side] replace the existing ip with urs.

Read full topic
